global.title: mlds
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

info.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Admnistrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!
error.server: An error has occurred.  Please login again by pressing the Login button again.

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 5 characters
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters
confirmpassword.match: Your password confirmation does not match the password

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 1 character
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters

confirmemail.match: Your confirmation email does not match the email

logout.title: MLDS-Logout
logout.subtitle: We are logging your out of your session.

register.title: Register
register.subwelcome: The gateway to access SNOMED CT Orientation

form.tos: Agree to our Terms and Conditions.

login.minlength: Your login is required to be at least 1 character
login.maxlength: Your login cannot be longer than 50 characters

country.notMLDS: Applications for use of SNOMED CT in your country of residence must be made to the appropriate representative from your country - here. If you wish to apply for a Public Good agreement to use SNOMED CT in another country, or wish to make other inquiries please contact the SNOMED International at info@snomed.org

messages.success: Registration saved! Please check your email for confirmation.

error.userexists: A user has already registered with that email address. Did you mean to login?
error.blocklist: Due to our IT policies we are unable to process the entered email address. Please contact support@snomed.org for further assistance.

excludemessage.link: does not use MLDS to distribute SNOMED CT. To register to download SNOMED CT, you can find more information by going to this link -
excludemessage.userConfirm: To continue your registration on MLDS, please can you confirm that you would like to deploy SNOMED CT in a different country.
excludemessage.accept: I confirm that I would like to use and deploy SNOMED CT in a country other than

emailVerification.detail: Please open the email we have just sent you to verify your account and get access to the MLDS

affiliateRegistration.title: Affiliate Registration
affiliateRegistration.conditions: Please select the conditions that the product will be used under

changeRequestedWarning.title: Affiliate Registration Needs Amendments
changeRequestedWarning.text: Your affiliate registration needs to be updated before it can processed. Please see email regarding the necessary changes to complete your registration.

affiliateRegistration.license.title: SNOMED CT Agreement
affiliateRegistration.license.error: You must agree to the terms and conditions of the SNOMED CT License in order to register, which also indicates potential fees that be required.

error.authentication: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials and try again. Passwords are case sensitive.
error.deregistered: Authentication failed! This account has been deregistered. Please contact support.
error.noPermissions: Authentication failed! We authenticated you, but your account has no access to this application, or is misconfigured. Please contact support.

messages.error: An error has occured! Settings could not be saved.

firstname.minlength: Your first name is required to be at least 1 character
firstname.maxlength: Your first name cannot be longer than 50 characters

lastname.minlength: Your last name is required to be at least 1 character
lastname.maxlength: Your last name cannot be longer than 50 characters

messages.error: An error has occured! The password could not be changed.
messages.expired: The reset link has expired or was invalid. Request another reset

messages.error: An error has occured! The session could not be invalidated.

errors.403: You are not authorized to access the page.
errors.title: Error page!

type.extended.COMMERCIAL: Commercial - Developer, Vendor or Terminology provider
type.extended.ACADEMIC: Academic - for internal use within an Organization. (Educational, Research, Development or Healthcare Provider)
type.extended.OTHER: Other - Use not stated in other options

standingStateWithExplanation.IN_GOOD_STANDING: In Good Standing - Approved full access, Account Paid, No Payment Required or Account Issue Resolved
standingStateWithExplanation.DEACTIVATION_PENDING: Deactivation Pending - Access to Account Only, No Download Capability
standingStateWithExplanation.DEACTIVATED: Deactivated - Access to Account Only, No Download Capability
standingStateWithExplanation.DEREGISTERED: Deregistered – No Access to MLDS Account
standingStateWithExplanation.PENDING_INVOICE: Pending Invoice – Access to Account only, Payment Outstanding
standingStateWithExplanation.INVOICE_SENT: Invoice Sent - Access to Account only, Payment Outstanding

form.pleaseFix: Please fix the errors listed above.

success.title: User account has been created.
success.body: The system will take you to continue your registration process in a few moments. If you are not redirected automatically please {{linkbegin}}click here.{{linkend}}

error.title: Your user could not be activated.
error.body: Please use the registration form to sign up. If you are still encountering difficulties please contact support.

contactInfo.title: Account Information
contactInfo.acceptNotifications: Yes notify me when a SNOMED package is updated.

notApproved.title: Registration not approved yet
notApproved.body: You can only modify the contact information for an affiliate once the registration request has been approved.

email.name: Email
email.unique: Email Addresses need to be unique.

billingAddress.name: Billing Address
billingAddress.useOrganizationAddress: Use Organization Address as Billing Address

extensionApplication.title: Start Extension Application Process
extensionApplication.sure: Are you sure you want to apply for this Extension?

form.title: Extension Application Form
form.why: Please describe why you would like access to this extension.

warning.change.detail: Your extension registration needs to be updated before it can processed. Please see email regarding the necessary changes to complete your registration.
warning.rejected.detail: Your extension registration needs to be updated before it can processed. Please see email regarding the necessary changes to complete your registration.

delete.title: Cancel Application
delete.sure: Are you sure you want to cancel this application?
delete.sure.detail: Doing so will cause you to lose all saved information on this application.

landingPage.purpose: This service is provided by SNOMED International for organizations and individuals to request use and access to the International Release of SNOMED CT for use in non-Member as well as some Member countries.
landingPage.furtherDetails: For further details, please refer to the SNOMED International website or the Frequently Asked Questions.
landingPage.member.purpose1: MLDS is a tool used by the NRC in
landingPage.member.purpose2: to manage the Affiliate Licensing of SNOMED CT including new applications, renewals and usage reporting within
landingPage.member.purpose3: and where relevant in non member countries.

releases.title: Releases available for Registered Users
releases.noAuth: Log in to download or click register to start application process.
releases.countryIsMissing: If the country you're looking for is not in this list, please refer to the SNOMED International website for release download information.
releases.notAvailable: There are currently no release packages available
releases.reviewLicense: Please review the following license and accept it before downloading the release package:

warning.aAttention: Application needs attention, click to continue application

requestPasswordReset.title: Password Reset
requestPasswordReset.detail: We will send you an email containing a link to a password reset form.
requestPasswordReset.emailNotFound: Email entered is not found in system.
requestPasswordReset.resetEmailSent: Password reset process started, please check your email.

usage.title: Usage Log
usage.instructions: Please complete your usage declaration for the time period selected.

modal.title: Create Usage Declaration
modal.instructions: Please complete your usage declaration for all time periods. Please include reports for past and current use.

submit.title: Submit Usage Declaration
submit.instructions: Please check and ensure your usage declaration show below is correct before submitting.

retract.title: Retract Usage Declaration
retract.instructions: Are you sure you want to re-tract this report? You will return to the same usage report to edit and re-submit. For a new time period you must submit a new declaration report.

usageLog.title: Submitted Usage Report
usageLog.subTitle: License Usage
usageLog.pleaseFill: Please fill out any known usage information at this time, you will be asked to confirm usage once your application is approved.

countries.title: Countries in Use
countries.subTitle: Select the non-member countries in which SNOMED CT will be used.

institutions.title: Sublicensed Institutions
institutions.selectFirst: A country needs to be selected before entering Sublicensed Institutions.
institutions.hospAndInst.title: Hospital(s)/Institution(s)
institutions.practices.title: Practice(s)

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.provideStaff: How many Hospitals provide staff to stated Practices?
dataAnalysis.usingDCSNotHosp: How many Practices are using Data Creation Systems and are NOT part of a Hospital organization?
dataAnalysis.usingDCSNotPract: How many Hospitals or other Institutions are using data creation systems and cannot be defined as Practices under the definition of the license?
dataAnalysis.howManyDAS: How many Data Analysis Systems have you deployed in this region and how many databases are there per deployment?

modal.subtitle: Hospital/Institution Name
modal.dateBefore: Date before Started to Use date
modal.sure: Are you sure you want to remove
modal.addPractices: Please add the number of practices using SNOMED

usageLog.notificationRequired: Affiliates are required to notify SNOMED International prior to engaging in any activities that do not fall within the existing categories at which time the SNOMED International will determine the appropriate Fee Structure for the activity in question.

warning.required.title: Usage Declaration Required
warning.required.msg: Your preliminary usage declaration has been saved. However, please be advised that you will need to submit your final usage declaration for the current year by January 15th. Please note all previous years usage reports must be submitted in order to download SNOMED CT.
warning.change.title: Affiliate Registration Requires Change
warning.change.msg: Your affiliate registration needs to be updated before it can processed. Please see email regarding the necessary changes to complete your registration.
warning.declined.title: Affiliate Registration Declined
warning.declined.msg: Your affiliate registration has been declined. Please see email regarding the details of the decision.
warning.deactivated.title: Account Deactivated
warning.deactivated.msg: Your account has been Deactivated. Release package downloads and Extension applications have been suspended. Please contact mlds@snomed.org to resolve the issue.
warning.iPending.title: Account Pending Invoice
warning.iPending.msg: Your account has a pending invoice. Release package downloads have been suspended. Please contact mlds@snomed.org to resolve the issue.
warning.dPending.title: Account Deactivation Pending
warning.dPending.msg: Your account is scheduled to be Deactivated. Please contact mlds@snomed.org to resolve the issue.

postAnnouncement.title: Post Announcement
postAnnouncement.salutationMessage: Remember to add a salutation and valediction to the email body.
postAnnouncement.affiliatesClarification: Approved affiliates with an account standing of:
postAnnouncement.additionalEmailsHelp: Send the announcement to additional email addressses.

deleteAffiliateModal.sure: Are you sure you want to delete the affiliate?
deleteAffiliateModal.explanation: Deleting an Affiliate will also delete their Applications and Usage Information. The user will no longer be able to login to the account.

ihtsdoReleases.title: SNOMED Releases
ihtsdoReleases.noPublicReleases: There are currently no public releases available.
ihtsdoReleases.noOfflineReleases: There are currently no offline & alpha/beta releases available.
ihtsdoReleases.noOnlineVersions: There are currently no online versions of this release.
ihtsdoReleases.noOfflineVersions: There are currently no offline & alpha/beta versions of this release.
